means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 甘布尔来源于古诺斯语，含义是“老的”(old)

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个动词均含有"打赌，赌博"之意。
means: bet ： 指竞赛中的打赌，也指双方对有疑惑之事争执不下的打赌。在口语中，bet作"确信，敢说"解。
gamble ： 多指投机，为获得某物或牟利而冒大险，含孤注一掷意味。

sentence.Network_en: They are not prepared to gamble their careers on this matter.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们不愿意把自己的事业押在这件事上。

sentence.Network_en: Most people visit Las Vegas to gamble their hard-earned money.
sentence.Network_cn: 大多数人拿着辛苦挣来的钱去拉斯维加斯赌博。

sentence.Network_en: Punters are expected to gamble £70m on the Grand National.
sentence.Network_cn: 预计众多赌马者会在国家大马赛上下注7,000万英镑。

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent.: from obsolete gamel 'play games', or from the verb game

entry.def: A gamble is a risky action or decision that you take in the hope of gaining money, success, or an advantage over other people.

example.ex: Yesterday, he named his cabinet and took a big gamble in the process.
example.tran: 昨天他冒了很大的风险任命了内阁成员。

example.ex: ...the French president's risky gamble in calling a referendum.
example.tran: 法国总统决定举行全民公决的冒险之举

entry.def: If you gamble on something, you take a risky action or decision in the hope of gaining money, success, or an advantage over other people.

example.ex: Few firms will be willing to gamble on new products...
example.tran: 很少有公司愿意冒险开发新产品。

example.ex: They are not prepared to gamble their careers on this matter...
example.tran: 他们不愿意把自己的事业押在这件事上。

entry.def: If you gamble an amount of money, you bet it in a game such as cards or on the result of a race or competition. People who gamble usually do it frequently.

example.ex: Most people visit Las Vegas to gamble their hard-earned money...
example.tran: 大多数人拿着辛苦挣来的钱去拉斯维加斯赌博。

example.ex: John gambled heavily on the horses...
example.tran: 约翰在这几匹马上下了很大的赌注。

means.word_mean: 1. money that is risked for possible monetary gain
1. take a risk in the hope of a favorable outcome;

sentences.sentence: "When you buy these stocks you are gambling"

auth_sentence.content: The gamble certainly worked out well for West Ham.
auth_sentence.res_content: The gamble certainly worked out well for West Ham.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The gamble certainly worked out well for West Ham.

auth_sentence.content: They took an extreme gamble, which was unnecessary.
auth_sentence.res_content: They took an extreme gamble, which was unnecessary.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They took an extreme gamble, which was unnecessary.

auth_sentence.content: There is a way to avoid this cruel gamble.
auth_sentence.res_content: There is a way to avoid this cruel gamble.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There is a way to avoid this cruel gamble.

Sentence.sentence: people got involved in online gambling

sentences.en: He gambles when he is in cash.
When he had gambled his money, he was put to shifts to live.
sentences.cn: 他输光了钱就凑合着过日子。

sentences.en: He gambled his savings to start a small store.
sentences.cn: 他孤注一掷地用自己的积蓄开了一家小店。

sentences.en: The federal government gambled hundreds of thousands of dollars in research funds to work on the project.
sentences.cn: 联邦政府为了这项研究计划冒险动用了好几十万美元的资金。

sentences.en: Their house and land were all gambled and lost by her husband that morning.
sentences.cn: 他们的房子、土地就在那一天上午被她丈夫全输光了。

sentences.en: I gambled that they wouldn't shoot.
sentences.cn: 我大胆假定他们不会开枪。

means.word_mean: 赌博, 打赌; 投机, 冒险

sentences.en: Setting up this business was a bit of a gamble.
sentences.cn: 开办这样的公司有点冒险。

sentences.en: The operation may succeed, and it may not;  it's a bit of a gamble.
sentences.cn: 这次手术没把握, 可能成功, 也可能失败。

jushi.english: He gambles when he is in cash.
The Federal government gambled hundreds of thousands of dollars in research funds to work on the project.
jushi.chinese: 联邦政府为了这项研究计划冒险动用了好几十万美元的资金。

jushi.english: Their house and land were all gambled and lost by her husband that morning.
jushi.chinese: 他们的房子、土地就在那一天上午被她丈夫全输光了。
